text: @paulasport20011 @StechDoesItAll @marcorubio @GovRonDeSantis No, it was to flatten the curve to help hospitals AND, I repeat and to get testing up to spread and contact tracing. I do not see that Florida did bear enough to get ahead of this. Without a vaccine, contact tracing, a simple and old tool, is the best way to fight this.
